title: Large-Scale Connectome Analytics in the Cloud
text: We learn how to access and analyze large-scale connectome datasets hosted on BrainCircuits.io remotely using Python and DuckDB.

title: Large-Scale Connectome Analytics in the Cloud
text: We learn how to access and analyze large-scale connectome datasets hosted on BrainCircuits.io remotely using Python and DuckDB.

title: Large-Scale Connectome Analytics in the Cloud
text:
Requirements
We need to first install DuckDB into our Python environment
pip install duckdb==0.8.1

title: Large-Scale Connectome Analytics in the Cloud
text:
Datasets
Every dataset on BrainCircuits.io has a unique string identifier. You can find the identifier in the About widget in the application, or by visiting this URL to get an overview of public datasets want to access.
